body: Damn, I wish the girls weren't so cute, so that I wouldn't have any desire to read this, because man is there no way I can get hard with him in there. XD I'd rather see a girl fucked by an actual monster, than see this guy fuck anyone.

Fak I already read this....
Welp maybe next time I'll read the comment first
This dude is so grotesque I'm literally laughing when the contrast beyween these babes & him is made apparent 🤣
@JackOxi i think they would be aware i too want to hear everyones opinion, for research purposes...

I think this is a good time to talk about the philosophy of this work, if the hypnosis only works four times then does that mean each time the hypnosis last a shorter amount of time? What if Satou used the blink app on a hypnotist? Would they be aware from the first time or would they be more susceptible? All very important questions to be answered, I can tell the lore of this world runs deep.
Last page... Didn't see that coming
